content.detailedDescription:
In early june of 2017,

i suffered a headache at around 11:00 pm so i decided to go to bed. i entered my bed room and my head began to feel heavy and eyes began to hurt with a intense pain. i got into bed and almost instantly i fell asleep. what seemed like seconds later i heard the tv and the playstation 4 turn on down stairs, upon hearing this i thought maybe my wife was home from work. i realized that couldn't be possible because she didn't get off until later that day. fully aware of what was going on (but obviously still tired) i tried to get out of bed but found myself unable to move at the slightest. sleep paraylsis had been common for me throughout life so at first i wasn't too worried but this was different.  i began to panic and try to force myself out of this paralysis but everytime i used energy i heard a voice inside of my head tell me to stop moving and sleep. i knew the voice wasn't my own because at the same time i was talking to my self in my head (almost yelling) saying "wake up now!" this battle with the other voice, that almost seemed to control me went on for about 15 minutes until i finally had enough. i said a quick prayer and promptly rolled over onto my back trying to catch my breath when suddenly i saw it! 
 please be aware: the incident below happened in a matter of seconds so i am trying to describe as best as possible.
directly in front of me on my window sill was a small figure, if i had to estimate it was maybe 3 feet tall. i did not see any eyes because the room was pitch black, but the silhouette of the figure was clearly visible  because of the light that shown through the blinds. i believe it had its back towards me, one hand was raised and there was a bright blue almost white light that was casting through the window onto it. a quick flash was emitted and the being was gone, almost instantly that the being had left that my headache, eye pain, and fatigue also left.

this experience has truly, truly changed my life. i have had other incidents in my life that now that i look back on after doing more research i believe we're other visitations and or abductions. i appreciate you taking the time to read this and if anyone could offer me help or insight , i'd be very greatful.
content.summary: Heard a sound down stairs, paralysis in place in bed, heard voice in head telling me to stay still and go to sleep, saw a humanoid small figure enter or exit window that was closed

content.detailedDescription: I noticed this for at least 10 minutes before i turned on the recorder.  i was watching through the lens when the lights on the right side seem to stop.  i think the larger lights on the left seem to be rotating slower than the one in the middle or the one of the right.  the lights make it appear that there is an object in the sky.  i got scared because of the animals in the distance and i didn't know why there wasn't any sound that would identify itself as being an aircraft.
content.summary: The lights can blink, rotate, change color and make it appear there must be an object in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was about 10 years old. i looked out my window and told my brother which  slept in the same room i see a lighting bug. i remember him saying to soon and he came over to look out the window. the blinking light kept getting bigger. he was 12, said a plane. and laid back down. i kept watching. no noise and getting closer. i went and woke up dad. my dad got up at that time could hear a low hum. them my bother came in and said we need to go outside. there was a cigar shaped craft about 100 feet long going slow. no noise going straight north to lake michigan. we watched it going by. and in a few minutes it dives. dad thought it crashed. called someone. so now watching tv i thing it went into the lake.
content.summary: A large cigar shaped ship. blinking lights but dark,

content.detailedDescription:
The night of july 2nd was fairly warm and our upstairs bedroom window left opened to let in some air. aroung 3:20 a.M., i head a thump noise coming from outside. having had a bear on our street looking for the garbage bins twice already that night, i thought this noise was the reappearance of this persistent bruin so i went to the window to look. fortunately, it turned out to be the closing car door of the newspaper guy making his early morning deliveries. 

from our bedroom window looking above my neighbour's house, something caught my eye. it was an extremely  bright light over burke mountain. this light was way too big and bright to be a star or a planet. i looked at it for a few minutes and found it to be unmoving, just sitting there hovering. it was definitely in the sky and not on the mountain itself. i could see some stars in the sky as the night was fairly cloudless. it was not a plane, helicopter or drone, did not have any flashing lights. i see aircrafts all the time landing or taking off from yvr and this was definitely not anything of the sort. 

i stared at it for a few minutes then went to the bathroom and when i returned to the window, the light had not moved, it was still there. i thought of taking a picture or video with my phone but decided it would amount to nothing close to depicting what i was seeing. it was simply too far to take a good photo of it. i then took the binoculars and what i saw mystified me. with the binoculars, this light was not one but five round lights side by side in a row. the middle light was the largest and most powerful. next to it on each sides were two others also round but not as big and therefore not as powerful. they each emitted their own beam of light powerful enough to be radiating above, below and on each side of this row of lights. 

i stared at it for a few minutes more then around 3:45 a.M., as they simply continued to beam, went back to bed. it did not move but remained stationary the entire time i was looking through the binoculars. these lights reminded me of very bright stadium lights, giving off a powerful bright white light, meant to illuminate a large area. the lights were most definitely above the mountain, and not on it. i've lived in the area for many years and this was most definitely extremely odd and out of place. even if these lights had been on the mountain itself, there is nothing on that part of west burke mountain but trees. by the time i woke up at 7am, it was gone. i woke up my husband who had been sleeping downstairs, not wanting to deal with a hot bedroom. when i explained what i had seen, he casually replied that i had seen a ufo. later on that day, i told a neighbour what i had seen. he suggested that it could have been someone or something on quarrie road. but this was impossible. that road is on the east side of the mountain and these lights were most definitely on its west side and above the tree line, not on it. besides, who would have such powerful beams and use them in the middle of the night? why bring them there to shine down on the city below? from the way they were pointing, it looked like they were aimed at somewhere near surrey and the u.S. border.

the whole time i watched these lights with my binoculars, i had a feeling that someone or something was watching. but what or who? what sort of technology could hover, and stationarily beam light on the ground in the middle of the night and for what reason so close to a major population  centre like metro vancouver? who was behind these lights? something or someone certainly was. and they were to close for my comfort. this experience left me mystified, perplexed and most definitely questioning not so much what i saw but why were these powerful lights there, who were behind them and to what purpose? july 2nd was a sunday on a long holiday weekend, the day after canada day, immediately after the fireworks. it didn't make any sense at all. it's been a few days now and i still carry with me an unsettled and eerie feeling of what i saw that night.
content.summary: A row of five very bright lights hovering above burke mountain coquitlam, b.C.

content.detailedDescription: B1 bomber doing a flyby at rose bowl in pasadena ca....Photo taken from glendale ca....Could not see with naked eye but saw them in photo.....What is that?
content.summary: I have a picture of b1 bomber going over rose bowl in pasadena ca....Was in glendale ca could not see with eye...But when picture came out on computer i was blown away at what i saw

content.detailedDescription: Saw lights watched it landed front of my house triangle ship with four light on each point silent went out side saw a grey alien and than 3 hours missing and i was standing facing my front door  with no memory of what happened after i saw the grey. during the day i started having flashes of memory and remembered them talking to me telepathically and also had a flash back of a grey touching my fore head with a strange sort of chop stick looking thing. it was the strangest thing i have every experienced in my life. also this morning i have a round red circle under my left arm pit which was never there before and i also now have a tiny nearly unnoticeable scar on my left arm about 5cm before the elbow about 2 cm in length which i never had before and it looks surgical as it is extremely straight. also now it looks like the grass is starting to die.
content.summary: Saw lights watched it landed front of my house triangle ship with four light on each point silent went out side saw a grey alien and than 3 hours missing and i was standing facing my front door

content.detailedDescription: Headed down road with a passenger. i saw an alien face in the clouds. i pointed it out to the passenger. they saw it too. i had the passenger use my cell phone to take a few pictures as i was driving (eleven total). the face was clearer when first noticed. you can still tell over half of it is there. (apologies for this not being an object, i am just not sure of another way to get this to known.)
content.summary: Head  in cloud-afterward, noticed a cube too

content.detailedDescription: I was riding in the passenger seat of a car on a gravel road outside of linden michigan around 8pm  i can't remember the date but it was between 1993 and 1997 when i had a strange feeling i looked out the passenger side window. hovering over a farm house seemed maybe 50feet above the house a large black object shaped like a boomerang i would estimate it being between two and three football fields long and did not move or make any sounds. i asked my mother who was driving what that was. we stopped for a few moments and it never moved never made a sound. it seemed to have three round bubbles on the bottom of the object as if you were to take a ball cut it in half and stick it to a flat surface.  i could see the object very clearly.Finally fear swept over us both and we drove off i watched as we drove away it never seemed to move. i had dreams about the object and aliens for the rest of my childhood. weeks later my family was watching tv and they were talking about the exact same object being seen across michigan and parts of wisconsin.
content.summary: Riding in passenger seat of car on gravel road when to my right it was hovering above an old farm house.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was outside doing yard work. i'm always looking up, day or night. i looked up at the clouds, early afternoon (1:30pm cst). i saw a cigar shaped, light colored (white?) object heading south from the north toward a cloud. i then see a dark object heading from below, assuming from the east, but definitely from below, toward the same cloud. i was thinking the dark object was a large bird, just gliding. the objects were similar in size from my viewpoint. i just assumed the white one was further away, since i thought it to be a plane. i saw the white object enter the cloud. i then see the dark object enter the cloud. i then see the white object leave the cloud back in the direction it came from, back toward the north. i continue to watch for the dark object, and do not see one. i glance back to the white object, it is continuing on. i look back to the cloud, and watched it dissapate as it blew it's way south over the next few minutes, never seeing the dark object again. i did look to the direction the white one was headed in, but i didn't see anything. what i viewed for rate of speed for the white one was seemingly no different from first site to end of site. i can only say i thought it was a plane for the rate that it was going. i informed the person doing yardwork with me of what i had just seen. since they were not looking up, they had not seen anything. they stated, "they're always watching." i was amazed i had seen something during daylight hours. i am sure that was not an airplane or a bird i had seen. i then immediately typed a note so as to not leave out details. in hindsight, it was odd to not hear sound-for as many planes that i see at what appears to be that high of an altitude, for the size that it was, there was no 'plane' noise. considering it went into a cloud, the altitude was much lower than i had assumed. i'm realizing how many wingless planes i've seen over the years.
content.summary: White cigar object came from n into cloud, dark cigar from e into cloud, white left back to n, dark one gone, cloud disappated

content.detailedDescription: I have these things the past 5 years.I was walking and seen 3 lights fly one at a time. july 4th around eleven o'clock.Im always watching the night sky.I never knew exactly what they were.However what i witnessed five years ago was far more terrifying then what i most recently have seen. sometimes they use clouds as cover. they look like stars. when you notice they are moving, it gets your attention. they fly high and in straight patterns. since i caught a glimpse of a flying creature in the past close enough for the estimation of wing spand! the length of a grade school auditorium. with two strangers asking me. if i seen what i saw. sometimes they stop enitting light so high in the sky. easy for me to lose sight these objects
content.summary: I see these things all the time flying in the sky with swooping motion. at night as balls of light knowing  they are alive and have wings

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was in my apartment complex at vista grande apartments in orange park florida.
2.  this sky was dark shortly after the fireworks display concluded and i noticed this reddish green pulsation orb flying in the opposite direction from where the fireworks finished.
3/4.  when i looked up, it did not look like any aircraft i have seen and i spent 20 years in the navy and lived around military air bases my entire life.  it flew in a linear line but seemed to bounce around up in down motion which made it difficult to keep focused on it.
5.  i felt amazed and confused that i was seeing this.  i saw something similar when i was in iraq in 2005 but never spoke about it.
6.   i couldn't keep focused on it and when i stopped recording i lost sight of the orb which was heading in the direction of jacksonville past the naval air station.
content.summary: Shortly after a big fireworks display i noticed this reddish green orb moving across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Watching fireworks in my backyard and saw 3 lights (constant, not blinking) further away than the fireworks (both are seen on the video). at first i thought someone lit lanterns or someone was using drones, but they were so bright and one of them was going in all different directions really fast and eventually they just (gradually) disappeared. i can't think of anything else it could be. i posted on social media and people i don't know in different states said they saw something similar at the same time, which is crazy. i was wondering if anyone else reported anything to you guys.
content.summary: 3 lights. 2 slow, 1 fast. lasted too long for firework, too short for drone

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and a friend were out on the back patio looking for nearby fireworks shows to watch. we were disappointed that they were all far away. out of the corner of my eye i spotted what looked to be a firework with a trail coming straight down out of the sky about a mile or two away. i got my friends attention thinking it was about to explode and begin a nearby fireworks show. to our amazement, the "firework" stopped dropping and sat still for a few seconds while still shining bright. i pulled out my phone as we both wondered out loud what the "f" it was that we were looking at. 

the object began to move horizontally from its fixed position while emitting a trail of what looked to be sparks to one side. i captured a short video where the orangish trail is visible. 

i can't remember why i stopped filming but a few seconds later i resumed filming and as i zoomed into the object it took on almost an orb shape on my video due to not being able to focus. a few seconds later an identicle object in the sky appeared above and to the right of the object we had been filming. i was very focused on my video but my friend was watching the whole time with his naked eye and remarking about how extraordinary it was and can be heard in the background (language is nsfw). 

i have never claimed to see anything strange in my life. i am still in amazement over what we saw the other night.  it could very well be explained away but we all sat around for 2 hours afterwards running through possibilities but nothing fits what we saw.
content.summary: Multiple hovering objects emitting trails and disappearing and reappearing

content.detailedDescription: Three red-orange lights appeared and disappeared in western sky then faded out one by one in a five minute span
content.summary: Three orbs of light appeared in the west then moved south and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Iam a u.S.Citizen voter & have all my facalities.And i have had three sitings now. these star like ufos are returning every year here. how i determined that these were ufos? is when i took a photo, when i opened it to my suprise.Chttps://mufoncms.Com/cgi-bin/report_handler.To each i tried to zoom in on them and to my suprise,each one was different...
     it changed in every picture 41 picts., the year of july 2015 . then 31 more in july of 2017.
     it was motionless in the sky over us, over top of cottonwood long as we were outside.But everytime i snaped a shot with my tablet it was a different object. i will tell u more in detail.
we finally went inside.I was affraid and excited at the same time,
content.summary: This star like object started coming here two years ago ,while we were outside celebrating. it comes here every july and was here again this year!  it's come here again for the third time.Please know this is no hoax or joke. i'm very serious.I hav72pics.

content.detailedDescription:
This my second experience with a similar craft i am frustrated and anxious,mild parinoa and lack of sleep and reslesness.

i am trying to understand why it is choosing or they are choosing this particular area of town, there's water and electrical transformers near by. i experienced a strong magnetic field with the hair on my arms and legs standing up.
after this current situation there has been an increase in military aircraft,f22, blackhawks, chinook and a unidentified  aircraft, indescribable flight dynamic.

i am not sleeping well...
content.summary: I went out to get some air and observed a similar craft to my original sighting, this ucav displayed different exterior color and scales similar to a snake reflecting ambiant light, experienced a mild electrical feild and the hair on my arms and legs ....

content.detailedDescription: Very small round object above clouds. high rate of speed like a fighter(f18)but no sound, looked thru binoculars and it had no wings. or any sounds very small greyish round object, very high, and fast, but like fighter cruise, .....It was round.
content.summary: I have been working in aviation for 20 yrs. small round object move very fast east to west, then 90 drees to the south, high altitude, aprox 30,000 to 40,000 ft, observed with binocs and it was round no wings, fast like a fighter with afterburnbutnosound.

content.detailedDescription: We were fishing seen some other strange lights around 3:30 am we looked straight up and this kite shape ufo appeared with white and purple lights on bottom moving slow
content.summary: We where fishing it came over us less then 1000 feet high crossed river and disappeared over the horizon it had white lites that changed to pruple

content.detailedDescription: I have the nasa app on my phone. i was viewing the iss view live feed and i noticed this spot on my screen. i first thought it was just on my glass then checked and it wasn't. i got it as big as i could on my screen. i took a screen capture to see it larger. it looked like the station was getting closer and then the screen went black and it said there was technical difficulties. when it came back it was pointed somewhere else because it didn't show the same direction. i took a screen capture of that as well. it is rough looking. don't know what it was then as you can tell in the first pic it was a clear shot of earth. then i don't know what it was at that point. they show a map as to where the iss is to be positioned during the feed. just seemed strange it cut off as it moved closer to the sphere. may just be a satellite not sure. maybe you know what it is up there.
content.summary: Looked like a round globe like item.

content.detailedDescription: Observed since 2014 a very loud machine sound from underneath building, rumbling is so loud, shakes my furniture, unable to sleep. i live on the top floor and have heard what i think are electronic beings on the roof. i know they have a contact with a craft as i think it uses the building to obtain water, as i can feel a heavy pressure that is extremely stressfull. not sure if you will get this, as they are in my computer as well, as computer company reports to me, they are professionals at hacking.
content.summary: Did not see it, just photographed lawn impression

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and children were outside watching fourth of july fireworks around 10 pm. i was inside on the phone. at 10:15 pm est my wife and children noticed a orb come out of the tree line to our direct south. the orb was giving off its own red and orange pulsating light (like a fire, but more red). my wife and kids did not think anything unusual at first, as the neighbors were lighting off fireworks (some of which were quite large). the orb continued on a path traveling directly toward us for a duration of a minute or two.

at that point, my wife and kids started to seriously consider this "firework" may be a ufo. my wife sent my youngest son in to get me, he walked in and told me a ufo was outside and i needed to come out now. i was still in conversation on my cell but walked out to see.

i walked outside and saw the orb, at first glance i thought "this is just a flare on a parachute".. i even said that to my wife. then i realized it wasnt a small flare, it was much larger. i believe it to be around 4-10 feet in diameter and at a distance of 300-400 feet away.

the orb continued to nearly hover without moving for about thirty seconds. i rushed to get off the phone so that i could video it. i started to video the object within about a minute of getting outside. by that time, the orb had continued east and started to ascend. it then continued on a steeper path up and directly to our east. within another minute, it disappeared into the clouds.

i regret i did not get off the phone faster. by the time i started filming the orb, it had moved away from its closest point to us (300 ft or so) to a distance of a half mile (approx)
content.summary: Red pusating orb spotted traveling from treeline to our south ascending to east then disapeared in cloud cover

content.detailedDescription: After coming home from a undisclosed location where i take part in pellet rifle target practice/outdoor time and it was around 6pm and 7pm. noticed time shifting by slowing time down, hours were moving very slow. noticed the object because it was the only bright light next to the moon and it was a beautiful clear blue california sky so it was obvious and used my bushnell vision assistance and saw the object just stuck up there.I thought it was a star or ufo. the object has 5 windows identical of u.S. capitol building small dome windows.Center light was bright and side ones were deem. i was paranoid, i thought we were gonna get invaded, after awhile i calmed down and realized they're part of the deep state and its' connected to u.S. military. notified the police department and faa. the object was moving with earth, as night got later the object got further away from my sight without moving. hope everyone can understand what i'm trying to say.
content.summary: Wow ufo in sun valley california

content.detailedDescription:
I was travelling around northumberland by car, stopping to take photographs, on 15 july 2016. i am not familiar with the area and can only speculate as to the precise location. i believe i was somewhere south of wooler, on a minor road in a very sparsely populated area to the west of the a697. the photograph in question was - i believe - taken in a south westerly direction. it was taken at 2.00pm.  

i was just recently looking through the photographs i took on that day when i noticed something unusual in one of them. at first i thought it was something on the computer screen - it wasn't. then i thought, perhaps, it may have been something on the camera lense. so i looked at the photographs i took before and after this one and the same 'object/s' are not visible in any of them.

i do not recall seeing anything unusual when i took the photograph. as such, all i have to go by is the photograph itself.

i would like to stress that at the place where the photograph was taken there was quite a lot of flies, given that it was both the summer and next to a field of sheep. this being said, i took perhaps 30/40 other photographs at this exact location - there was great light and stunning clouds - and have not seen any similar phenomena in any of the other photographs.

the fact that the largest of the 'objects' is out of focus suggests to me that whatever this 'object' is is close enough to the camera to be out of focus. but then if it is close to the camera - what is it? and having said this, the largest of the 'objects' doesn't look close to the camera when i look at the image as a whole.

after studying the photograph in greater detail i've noticed several other - as yet unidentified - 'objects' that share the same basic form of the larger object: they look 'cicular' or 'ovular', reflect the light on one side with shadow on the other. i cannot explain them.

i noticed that there are many dark spots in the image. some can be identified as birds, with feint but visible wings. one or two appear to have light reflecting on one side. there were some large flocks of dark birds in the area: ravens or crows of some kind. 

as an amatuer photographer i've taken many tens of thousands of photographs over the past decade. i don't recall seeing anything similar to what i've found in this image in any other photograph.
content.summary: Unidentified flying objects found in a photograph i took last year.

content.detailedDescription:
On july 4th 2017 at 7pm my friend and i sat down at a bench behind the salt museum in liverpool,ny to watch the firework display across onondaga lake at the amphitheater. we observed small fireworks in the distance, stars, moon  and jet aircraft coming from the west. at about 930pm just before fireworks started,both noticed two red/orange-fireball-orbs coming from sw across the lake directly above the amphitheater 3k.Ft.High at us; as big as jetliners. no one else seemed to notice. after a few seconds we realized it was not a meteor and i pulled out my camera. i got three shots of two red-orb fireballs at their fast speed...Then they slowed down and hovered turned into white-orbs. i took pictures of them just above the treeline hovering over the (?) regional market. then they just "drifted" up out of sight. all firework shows had now started and we seen two more orbs come from in the same direction, the same pattern only faster. we were both numb. upon uploading and printing the pictures there were three objects in the white-orb treeline shot. i did not see 3rd as i was taking pics...But my friend did. blown up...You can see 
the white-orbs on the left of the treeline shot were triangles as plain as day/night. the triangle on the far right has three glowing lights under it...
the two on the left seem to face their bottoms (lights) toward the far right one's glowing bottom. the fireball-orb close up is awesome...Like looking into the sun. do they enter as fireball/orbs and change into triangles?
i am under the impression they are in another dimension;as no see'm in space. 
having had a black-triangle "speak" to me in the 'sounds of silence' back on july 9th 2005; when a friend and i saw a delta shaped object just over our heads...When i thought to myself, "their going to take us away", i 'heard';, no-you are both defective. i know what to look for. if you aren't looking for it, it could be right next to you. (i.E. bug/snake,ufo) i bet all who did see it that night were sure it was part of the show... but we know. (but why?)
steeno
content.summary: Five fireball orb ufo's seen at onondaga lake park few min. before amphitheater fireworks show. three came in as red orbs turned into white triangles, hovered, rose out of sight.    w

content.detailedDescription: An orb was spotted above a tree line glowing brightly like a star around 1 am in november 2016. once it was spotted hovering above the tree line it then accelerated quickly up out of sight. when the viewer tried to see if he could find where it went there was no trace of it anywhere.
content.summary: Orb hovered than zipped out of sight once spotted

content.detailedDescription: A small glowing orb was spotted hovering above the tree line at approximately 1 am in november and then zipped quickly out of sight once it had been spotted. once it had disappeared it could no no longer be seen even after trying to track its actions
content.summary: Small orb hovered then zipped out of sight

content.detailedDescription: I have many contacts, the first one was in a propriety called barrosinha, i was walking to my grandfather garden, and i looked at the sky,and then, like in a instant, during 2 sec. i saw a ovni, it was like a oval ovni,with a grey colore, fixed, like it was looking at me,and when i looked again, was gonne. that viewing was at afternoon, by the end of the day. i was suprising, my first viewing of ovni, and also shoking. after that, i told my parents what happend. my second viewing was at night, 10pm-11pm, and since the first viewing, and just saw ovni's at night. as i was saying, i saw yellow light, like a star, move, calm. and it emitted a light pulse. it blinked twince and then, was starting to delete light and was vanished. i was amazed with the event.
content.summary: It was like a pulson star, with a calm movement

content.detailedDescription: In may of 1973 approximate date i was riding my motor cycle in eastern tehama county when i saw what looked like circular object hovering over the high power lines off in the distance.  i kept riding toward the power lines watching the object. it just seemed to be hovering over the power lines. i wanted to get a closer look. the next thing i remember i am riding my motorcycle in the opposite direction toward my home and the object is nowhere in site. i didn't tell anyone about it at the time because i didn't think any one would believe me.
content.summary: I was ridding my motorcycle in eastern tehama county. i saw craft hovering over high power lines.

content.detailedDescription: While driving home from work i witnessed a massive deep red to gentle orange fireball like object. this was floating/ hovering over a popular venue. however, there was no event scheduled for the night, nor any for a week prior, or for over a week into the future. thinking it was the moon i searched for it in the sky, and saw it behind me. due to the objects size, color and position the moon was immediately discounted as a cause. it was far larger than any known aircraft, and thee is no possibility it was a planet, as the sky was cloudy, and covered in city haze (even normally seen stars and iss not visible). also in the vicinity is a major casino with lights that are often reported as ufo's, but they look nothing like what i saw, along with being a few miles to the west of where this object was. slowly as i approached my home the object seemed to fade away. unfortunately due to the cloud cover i could not tell if it disappeared from view because of the clouds, or action caused by the object itself.
content.summary: Giant hovering fireball like object above major event venue. no event taking place at time. confirmed not moon, stars, etc.

content.detailedDescription: I have many contacts, the first one was in a propriety called barrosinha, i was walking to my grandfather garden, and i looked at the sky,and then, like in a instant, during 2 sec. i saw a ovni, it was like a oval ovni,with a grey colore, fixed, like it was looking at me,and when i looked again, was gonne. that viewing was at afternoon, by the end of the day. i was suprising, my first viewing of ovni, and also shoking. after that, i told my parents what happend. my second viewing was at night, 10pm-11pm, and since the first viewing, and just saw ovni's at night. as i was saying, i saw yellow light, like a star, move, calm. and it emitted a light pulse. it blinked twince and then, was starting to delete light and was vanished. i was amazed with the event.
content.summary: It was like a pulson star, with a calm movement
